import React,{useState} from 'react' import productItems from './productApi' import { Icon } from '@iconify/react' import SearchResult from './SearchResult' function SearchComponent() { const [searchField, setSearchField] = useState(""); const searchValue = productItems.filter((item) => { item.id.toLowerCase().includes(searchField.toLowerCase) }) console.log(searchValue) return ( <>
setSearchField(event.target.value)} />
) } export default SearchComponent
